posts.author: redfresnel
posts.post_text: November 2, 2016 at 9:08 AM#6How about command for adding info to the current cue on selected executor? I tried Assign Info and storing cue again with some options but no luck.Thank you in advance!

posts.author: glad
posts.post_text: November 2, 2016 at 11:16 AM#7same syntax, but replace the cuenumber with the systemvariable for current cue(and infotext with a popup, if needed)CodeInfo Cue $SELECTEDEXECCUE ("Enter info for cue")

title: Macro for info
